message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to our negotiation!
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not giving up much more than this!
That's still too skewed in your favor, Bob! I'll wait for a better offer.
Meet me in the middle, Bob! Let's make a deal!
You're getting closer to my target, but I still want a bit more!
That's still too far from what I'm comfortable with, Bob. I'll hold out for a better deal.
Let's call it a draw, Bob! 50-50 split, no more haggling!
